section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Byron R. White

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice Rehnquist
turn.text: the opinions of the Court in No. 86-870, Phillips Petroleum Company versus Mississippi and No. 86-939, and a companion case Etsi Pipelin Project versus Missouri will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: The Phillips case is here from the judgment of the Supreme Court of Mississippi.
For reasons stated in an opinion on file with the Clerk, we affirm the judgment of the Mississippi Supreme Court.
Justice O'Connor filed a dissenting opinion and she is joined by Justices Stevens and Justice Scalia.
Justice Kennedy took no part in the consideration or decision of the case.
